com.austinv11.collectiveframework.utils.math.geometry

Class Variable2DShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.austinv11.collectiveframework.utils.math.geometry.Variable2DShape

  • public class Variable2DShape
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represents a 2D shape with an indefinite amount of sides (until instantiation)

      • isPointValid

        @Deprecated
public boolean isPointValid(TwoDimensionalVector coord)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks if a point is inside the shape. DO NOT TRUST THIS- it is not always accurate, it is only 100% accurate with rectangles
        Parameters:
        coord - The point
        Returns:
        If the point is in the shape
